moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Spike Cannon
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
